title: Cannot open LOL Client
body:
So, just tried to play some lol tonight, after classwork was done, but opening the client window via desktop link opened a blank white window with this written on it:

Failed to load URL "https://riot:OnwoKYF8WOd_aIfzc5wDtw@127.0.0.1:52474/index.html" with error "unknown error code -21" (-21).

any idea what this is? it seems to act as a widow that is a solid image without proper borders and click and holding only drag the whole window around and there is no x or close button, not does the dash bar icon close it after i right click the dash bar (at the bottom of windows desktop) and select close window.

hope this helps in some small way to whatever is going on... if it isn't just me. 
I will update this or just delete this if i fix it by simply restarting my computer here in a sec and all goes well.


EDIT: the restart fixed whatever was not working that time around on my computer. back to the rift!
